abstract: Shares of BHP Billiton set a record high in Sydney, Australia on Friday, after a local newspaper reported that China has approached an Australian superannuation and investment fund to partner in a multibillion-dollar attempt to buy a 9 percent stake in the mining giant.
lead_paragraph: Shares of BHP Billiton set a record high in Sydney, Australia on Friday, after a local newspaper reported that China has approached an Australian superannuation and investment fund to partner in a multibillion-dollar attempt to buy a 9 percent stake in the mining giant.

headline.main: BHP Stock Mines Gold On Report of Partial Stake Buy
